pullrequest.title: Move light_buoy controller to gazebo plugin

content.raw: Alternatively, you could replace this combination of `IntUniform` \+ `while loop` to make sure that all indexes are different with a single call to `std::random_shuffle()` over a vector with \{0, 1, 2, 3\}. Then, you can choose the first three elements \(for example\) and they’ll be different.
content.html: Alternatively, you could replace this combination of IntUniform + while loop to make sure that all indexes are different with a single call to std::random_shuffle() over a vector with {0, 1, 2, 3}. Then, you can choose the first three elements (for example) and they’ll be different.
